Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8051 E. MAPLEWOOD AVENUE SUITE 210, GREENWOOD VILLAGE, Colorado, 80111, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Advanced Emissions Solutions Inc is a holding company that provides emissions solutions to customers in the coal-fired power generation, industrial boiler, and cement industries. The company has two reportable segments namely Refined Coal which provides a reduction of mercury and nitrogen oxide emissions at select coal-fired power generators through the production and sale of Refined Coal; and the APT segment.
